fields.title: Chat app
fields.description: A real-time chat platform built with Django and FastAPI, featuring seamless backend integration and an anonymous messaging mode. Users can connect without revealing identity, enabling spontaneous, privacy-first conversations. FastAPI handles async message delivery, while Django powers user flow and admin controls.

fields.title: Comic Reader
fields.description: A simple comic reader that supports .cbz files and uses Cloudinary for image storage and delivery. It extracts and displays comic pages in sequence, making it easy to browse through panels without manual unpacking. Designed for clarity and backend efficiency, with Cloudinary handling optimized media access

fields.title: Expense tracker
fields.description: A personal finance tool built with Django and Django REST Framework (DRF), connected to a React frontend. It allows users to log, categorize, and visualize expenses in real time. DRF powers the secure API layer, while React handles dynamic UI updates and filtering. Designed for simplicity and backend clarity, with a focus on modular architecture and clean data flow.

fields.title: E-commerce app
fields.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with Django, featuring product listings, cart management, and secure checkout. Includes user authentication, order tracking, and admin controls for inventory and pricing. Designed with modular views and reusable components to streamline backend logic and scale easily.

fields.title: Youtube video downloader
fields.description:
A simple and clean web application built with Django and Python to download YouTube videos directly from a URL.
The application uses the pytubefix library to fetch video data and streams the file directly to the user's browser without saving it on the server.

fields.title: Software Architecture: The Hard Parts
fields.author: Neal Ford, Mark Richards, Pramod Sadalage, Zhamak Dehghani

fields.title: Fix query parameter concatenation in RedirectView
Introduced process_lhs() method to Transform for API consistency
Clarified migration behavior for ManyToManyField transitions and UniqueConstraint usage
Fixed #33113 — Documented usage and caveats of HTML5 date input in DateInput widget
Fixed #35824 — Improved documentation for `patch_cache_control()` in Django’s caching guide

content.title: Home
content.about:
I'm a backend developer and open source enthusiast passionate about building scalable, reliable systems. I’ve contributed 5+ PRs to Django-related projects, with 2 successfully merged. My focus is on backend performance, latency, and system design — and I love turning complex ideas into practical tools.

Currently, I’m exploring distributed architectures and preparing to learn Go to expand my backend toolkit. My long-term goal is to become a backend architect who bridges theory and real-world implementation through open source and education.

books.title: Software Architecture: The Hard Parts
books.author: Neal Ford, Mark Richards, Pramod Sadalage, Zhamak Dehghani
